name: @ablestack/reactive-domain-objects
description: A suite of packages to facilitate building and running graphs of Reactive Domain Objects
author: jamshally

scripts.lpub: npm run build  && lerna run prepublishOnly --stream && yalc publish packages/rdo/dist/src --force --no-script && yalc publish packages/rdo-apollo-mobx-connector/dist/src --force --no-script
scripts.lpush: npm run build  && lerna run prepublishOnly --stream && yalc push packages/rdo/dist/src --force --no-script && yalc push packages/rdo-apollo-mobx-connector/dist/src --force --no-script
